name: GLOW-IN-THE-DARK COMIC + STREET MECH MINT DISK

metadata.name: Glow-In-the-Dark Comic + Street Mech Mint Disk: Genesis Rare Edition
metadata.description:
350 Multi-chain NFTs for the 'World’s First Glow In-The-Dark Comic + Street Mech Mint Disk' 
 Includes: 

➥physical book forged only at mint and includes digital edition 

➥10+ years worth of annual Black & White 50+ page manga style comics as HRC1155* or other ERC1155 airdrops

➥Covers of B&W airdrops will feature rarity scores to gamify the experience 

➥Mint Disk allows mint of high quality ERC721 Mech Avatar PFP and eventually metaverse ready, fully rigged 3D mecha. 

Future Street Mech NFT features six annual airdrops by incredible artists paired with music and colour editions of the comic. Print editions the Street Mech Breakbeat story will use experimental printing formats, including glow-in-the-dark inks and blacklight inks. 

Website: https://threefoldcomics.com  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/threefoldcomics 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/threefoldcomics 
Discord: https://discord.gg/threefoldcomics 

Access content of your token here: https://threefoldcomics.com/verify 

*HRC1155 is the Harmony ONE equivalent and can be bridged into an ERC1155.

attributes.value: Glow-In-the-Dark Comic + Street Mech Mint Disk
